attributes.action: Create a panel of experts, voted in by the public, to sensibly allocate funds dispensed to the Family Justice System.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present, the considerable funding received by the family justice system, which goes towards managing organisations like CAFCASS, is being misused and poorly allocated.

Having a panel, made up of independent professionals from senior experts in medical, legal and financial sectors to informed pressure groups, would ensure a complete discussion on how these funds would be best dispensed and would allow the system a chance to re-energise itself and function more effectively.

This panel would be selected and voted in by the public.
